price: Na nyama hoa amekuumbieni. Katika hao mna vifaa vya kutia joto,na manufaa mengineyo, na baadhi yao mnawala.
arabic: وَٱلۡأَنۡعَٰمَ خَلَقَهَاۖ لَكُمۡ فِيهَا دِفۡءٞ وَمَنَٰفِعُ وَمِنۡهَا تَأۡكُلُونَ
footnotes: Enyi waja! Mwenyezi Mungu amekufadhilini - amekuumbieni nyama hoa, wanyama wa kufuga, kama ngamia, na ng'ombe, na kondoo, na mbuzi, ili mpate kutokana na sufi zao na manyoa yao vifaa vya kukupatieni joto kujihifadhi na baridi, na mle nyama yao mhifadhi uhai wenu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wal-anʿāma khalaqahā lakum fīhā dif'on wamanāfiʿu wamin'hā takulūna
